pageContext.claim: “If you elect me [Biden], your taxes are going to be raised, not cut...And here’s how it works. I'm going to raise taxes...You're going to get a tax raise.”
pageContext.analysis: The Trump presidential campaign is the master of the mischievous clip job. Time after time, the president’s campaign has released ads that snip and clip Biden’s speeches and remarks to make the former vice president appear to say the opposite of what he was saying. The three statements from this ad the president tweeted fall directly into that same category and are a clear example of isolation from the Fact Checker's guide to manipulated video. Moreover, Biden is not planning to raise everyone’s taxes — and the Trump campaign knows this. Otherwise, it wouldn't be so quick with the scissors.
